input_args.passage: 'Orkworld | Orkworld is a fantasy role-playing game featuring orks. It was designed by John Wick, illustrated by Thomas Denmark and released by Wicked Press.'
input_args.claim: 'On the other hand, from the second and third sources, we learn that "John Wick" is a character from an American media franchise, but these sources don\'t mention any role-playing games related to John Wick.'
